data.title: Great atmosphere but overpriced.
data.text: This is in an old historic building.  The place is beautiful.  However, I think the food is over priced.  The quality is good but not outstanding.  Service is great and, like I previously stated, the atmosphere is really nice.  Good for a romantic evening.

data.title: Great food
data.text: Everything was great from the service to the food. The banana foster is the best dessert on the menu. It's a little pricy, but for a special occasion it's perfect.

owner_response.author: Rajee P, Manager at Cheeves Bros Steak House, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Robert,

Thank you for dining with us! See you soon.

Rajee
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great service
data.text: We have come here for years, because of the great waitstaff.  The bar business is overwhelming the restaurant's with the cheap skates not willing to pay full fare.  I don't t like the tv or noise coming onto the dining room side.  The food was good, but the sauce/gravy on my steak Diane was too thick, almost congealed and too salty.  It overwhelmed the steak and mushrooms.  We had a nice romantic dinner.  The best upscale restaurant outside the big cities.

owner_response.author: Rajee P, Manager at Cheeves Bros Steak House, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
We are glad that you had a nice dinner and wanted to say thank you for your feedback and for dining with us.

Thank you,
Rajee
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: They need a good chef
data.text: Had a business meating and wanted to impress my new client, should have gone to Pinetti's. I had the Salmon en Croute and it used to be much better a couple of years ago. I remeber you had a chef from Florida at that time. My client had the Shrimp with jalapeno cover with cheese and a salad wedge, he said it was good but there was too much cheese and the cheese was burnt on the bottom.  Toooo expensive

owner_response.author: Rajee P, Manager at Cheeves Bros Steak House, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
We sure hate to hear your experience with us did not meet your expectations. Please ask for myself the next time you are in.

Thank you,
Rajee
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Just there for the crab cakes!
data.text: They were the best I've had west of Maryland! Wonderful crunch and flavor. I look forward to passing by again

owner_response.author: Rajee P, Manager at Cheeves Bros Steak House, responded to this review
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Happy Hour
data.text: Outstanding snacks.  Great wine.  Best atmosphere in area.  Classy.  Hospitality is excellent.  Always fun.  Always great service.  Thank you

owner_response.author: Rajee P, Manager at Cheeves Bros Steak House, responded to this review
owner_response.text: You are very welcome! Thank you.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Texas favorite
data.text: This steakhouse opened in Temple when I was a surgery resident here over 14 years ago. It is one of my favorite steakhouses now having travelled the world over. Every time I come back for business, this is a must stop. It's not cheap, but well worth every penny. Great atmosphere, great drink selection, and most importantly, great steaks! The filet, Pittsburgh rare, with merlot sauce, French onion soup, and truffle mashed potatoes is unbeatable, even in the nicest NYC or other Texas establishments. Enjoy the experience, and enjoy some fine Texas beef!

owner_response.author: Rajee P, Manager at Cheeves Bros Steak House, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank you for your continued patronage of our restaurant. We really appreciate your feedback. 

Thank you,
Blake
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Fantastic business dinner!
data.text: Had a business dinner in the upstairs private room last night, it was a great experience.  We had firecracker shrimp, sliders and scallop appetizers, and all were great.  I had the house salad, which had a honey pecan dressing (it was yummy), a petite filet with mushrooms (garlic-y), a loaded baked potato (crispy skin-yum), and the white chocolate bread pudding (sweet, sticky and rich) for dessert.  They served the salads with warm homemade pumpernickel bread, it's rich and delicious.  The food came out at a leisurely pace, but the service was very attentive and efficient.   Restaurant has great atmosphere too.  Highly enjoyable experience, it's a must try.

owner_response.author: Rajee P, Manager at Cheeves Bros Steak House, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Renee, thank you so much for the great review of our restaurant and we look forward to having you again soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Fabulous steakhouse!
data.text: We love dining at Cheeves.  Nothing like it in our area and we travel over an hour to get there.  Never had anything there we didn't like.  Fabulous service and atmosphere.  My husband remembers going there as a boy with his grandfather when the building was a department store.  Very neat old building.

owner_response.author: Rajee P, Manager at Cheeves Bros Steak House, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
That is awesome!! Thank you so much for traveling to dine with us, that makes us happy! Please say, hi the next time you're in. We appreciate the time you took to leave us a five star review. Thanks again

-Rajee
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Bar menu always lunch prices in early evening
data.text: Great spot to meet a few friends for happy hour.  Grab some great food at a reduced price right after work. Everything I tasted off the lunch menu was amazing!

owner_response.author: Rajee P, Manager at Cheeves Bros Steak House, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
That is great news, thank you so much for sharing your feedback!

-Rajee
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great for lunch!
data.text: This place is a little too pricey for my budget for dinner, but it is an excellent choice for lunch. I love the Ponchartrain Chicken!

owner_response.author: Rajee P, Manager at Cheeves Bros Steak House, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thanks so much for the 5 star review, Tim! We are glad to have you anytime and yes, our lunch options are perfect for any budget. We will see you soon. Say, hi the next time you are in.

Thank you - Rajee
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Excellent Dining Experience
data.text:
We weren't expecting a fine dining option in Temple Texas but we found one!

Located in the old city center this restaurant offers an outstanding menu, super bar area, happy hour with inexpensive beverage choices, 1/2 price appetizers starting at 7:00pm.

Known for its steaks that is exactly what we had and they were excellent.  Good wine selection with reasonable prices.

Service was excellent.  Nice, upscale decor.  A bit pricey but for what is offered the value is definitely worth it.

owner_response.author: Rajee P, Manager at Cheeves Bros Steak House, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thanks so much for the review, Dave and we hope to see you soon.

Thank you - Rajee
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great place for drinks and dinner in their bar.
data.text: We really enjoy going here for dinner and drinks.  We always eat in the bar area at one of there bar tables and order from the Causal menu section (which is available all day in the bar area). There are lots of good food choices and everything always taste very good.

owner_response.author: Rajee P, Manager at Cheeves Bros Steak House, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thanks so much for the wonderful 5 star review of our restaurant and for sharing your experience for others to see.  See you soon!

Thank you - Rajee
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great Steaks with a Upscale Experience
data.text: Steaks are really good and they are high quality but the consistency each time I have been there has been lacking. They do offer a diverse menu including chicken, seafood and pasta.  Just be prepared to pay a bit higher than your everyday steakhouse.

owner_response.author: Rajee P, Manager at Cheeves Bros Steak House, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
William,  thank you so much for review and for dinning at Cheeves Bros Steak House.  Please ask for Rajee or Blake the next time you are in, we would like to ensure your experience is outstanding.

Thanks so much - Rajee
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Excellent food and service!  Great place for a quiet lunch!
data.text: Cheeves has some wonderful new menu items.  I have tried the chicken pot pie and the red fish tacos.  Both are outstanding!  The tacos are really spicy, so if you don't like spicy, these are not for you.  Both items are really generous, so you'll bring home half of your food for another meal.  My friends and I love this place for a quiet, relaxing lunch!

owner_response.author: Rajee P, Manager at Cheeves Bros Steak House, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Wow!! Thank you so much for the great 5 star review of our restaurant.  See you soon.

Thank you - Michelle
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Dinner with friends was awsome!
data.text: I had a great experience at Cheeves Bros in their Bar area. Their lunch menu is available in the evenings too, making it a very affordable dinner, and the steak I had was cooked perfectly. Their service was great, and there was hardly a time when I had to try to get a waiter's attention. I really enjoyed it, and I'm looking forward to going back 😊

owner_response.author: Rajee P, Manager at Cheeves Bros Steak House, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Great! We cannot wait to see you again. Thank you so much!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Sumptous dining deep in the Heart...
data.text: Cheeves Bros Steak House is an oasis in this area of Texas for fine dining. The ambience, is cultured and refined. You are greeted warmly as soon as you enter and escorted amicably to your table. For appetizers I recommend the onion soup and the lobster bisque. for the main the NY Strip is unbeatable. The wine list will have you pondering long and hard as there are many excellent choices to choose from. Dessert itself is a feast onto itself as there are many fine choices. Favorites at our table included the Bread Pudding and the Crème Brulle. I can recommend too the Café French and the Irish Coffee. The service is attentive and efficient. what more can you ask. come here when in the area, you will be glad that you did.

owner_response.author: Rajee P, Manager at Cheeves Bros Steak House, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you so much for the wonderful feedback about your dining experience at Cheeves Bros. Steak House. You selected divine options and we are glad you enjoyed it.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Best Restaurant in Texas
data.text: Our last dinner at Cheeves was outstanding like all the past events.  Great food, service, and atmosphere!  Best steaks in USA, and prices are very reasonable considering salad, side, and fresh bread are included! Continuous happy hour bar is a plus!!!

owner_response.author: Rajee P, Manager at Cheeves Bros Steak House, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you so much for the wonderful 5 star review, Ken!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great food, Especially for Temple Texas
data.text: I don't think I have had anything here that was not fantastic.  I especially love their lobster bisque.  We can't eat here often because the food is very expensive.  That said what you get for what you pay is a good value.  In a larger city the pricing could easily be 20%-40% more than it is.  I enjoy going for lunch since they offer some plates at better pricing.  If your looking for a very nice dining experience for a date or business lunch/dinner, and you don't want to make the trip to Austin or Dallas this is the place to go.  We are lucky to have fine dining in Temple Texas.

owner_response.author: Rajee P, Manager at Cheeves Bros Steak House, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you so much for the fabulous review of your experience at our restaurant! We hope to see you again soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great Event Spot
data.text:
We chose this restaurant for our anniversary dinner. We dressed up and felt right at home at Cheeve's Brothers. Service was outstanding. Waiter was there when you needed something, but never hovering or annoying. 

Appetizers all looked good, but we went with Oysters Rockefeller. They were a great start to our meal. We then each selected a salad. The Blue Cheese wedge was wonderful with lots of blue cheese. The Caesar Salad was also great, with the option to include anchovies. 

We then each ordered a steak. I tried the New York Strip and my wife selected the rib eye with a crab cake. Both steaks were cooked correctly and were wonderful. 

I will agree this is not an inexpensive place, but it is not trying to be. This is a nice steak house with a great wine list. We looked at the seafood section of the menu and it all looked good as well, but this was a steak night for us.  

They do offer a lunch menu and it is much less expensive. Might be a great way to try out the restaurant.

owner_response.author: Rajee P, Manager at Cheeves Bros Steak House, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Happy Anniversary!  Thank you so much for choosing Cheeves Bros. to celebrate your special night and for the wonderful review! Stop in for lunch one day, we would love to have you. See you soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response
